00033 LaAnimalParameter::LaAnimalParameter() : LaSerialisable(), LaGuid()
00034 {

00037   mDescription="Not Set";
00038 }

00045 LaAnimalParameter::LaAnimalParameter(const LaAnimalParameter& theAnimalParameter)
00046 {
00047   mName=theAnimalParameter.name();
00048   mDescription=theAnimalParameter.description();
00049   setGuid(theAnimalParameter.guid());
00050   setAnimalGuid(theAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00051   mPercentTameMeat=theAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00052   mValueSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand();
00053   mValueCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueCommonGrazingLand();
00054   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00055   mEnergyType = theAnimalParameter.energyType();
00056   mFodderUse = theAnimalParameter.fodderUse();
00057   mFoodSourceMap = theAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00058 
00059   // fodder stuff here
00060 
00061   mUseSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand();
00062   mUseCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand();
00063   mFallowUsage = theAnimalParameter.fallowUsage();
00064   mRasterName = theAnimalParameter.rasterName();
00065 }

00067 LaAnimalParameter& LaAnimalParameter::operator=(const LaAnimalParameter& theAnimalParameter)
00068 {
00069   if (this == &theAnimalParameter) return *this;   // Gracefully handle self assignment
00070 
00071   mName=theAnimalParameter.name();
00072   mDescription=theAnimalParameter.description();
00073   setGuid(theAnimalParameter.guid());
00074   setAnimalGuid(theAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00075   mPercentTameMeat = theAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00076   mValueSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand();
00077   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00078   mValueCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueCommonGrazingLand();
00079   mUseSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand();
00080   mUseCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand();
00081   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00082   mEnergyType = theAnimalParameter.energyType();
00083   mFodderUse = theAnimalParameter.fodderUse();
00084   mFoodSourceMap = theAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00085 
00086   // fodder stuff here
00087 
00088   mFallowUsage = theAnimalParameter.fallowUsage();
00089   mRasterName = theAnimalParameter.rasterName();
00090   return *this;
00091 }

00209 void LaAnimalParameter::setFodderData(LaFoodSourceMap theFoodSourceMap)

00227 bool LaAnimalParameter::fromXml(QString theXml)
00228 {
00229   //qDebug("Loading animal parameter from xml");
00230   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00231   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00232   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("animalParameter");
00233   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00234   {
00235     //TODO - just make this a warning
00236    //qDebug("top element could not be found!");
00237   }
00238   //qDebug("AnimalParameter::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00239   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00240   //qDebug("AnimalParameter::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00241   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00242   mDescription=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("description").text());
00243   mAnimalGuid=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("animal").text());
00244   mPercentTameMeat=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("percentTameMeat").text()).toFloat();
00245   mUseCommonGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useCommonGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00246   mUseSpecificGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useSpecificGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00247   mValueCommonGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00248   mValueSpecificGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00250   //mAreaUnits=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00251   QString myAreaUnits = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00252   if (myAreaUnits == "Dunum")
00253   {
00254     mAreaUnits=Dunum;
00255   }
00256   else if (myAreaUnits == "Hectare")
00257   {
00258     mAreaUnits=Hectare;
00259   }
00260   QString myEnergyType = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("energyType").text());
00261   if (myEnergyType == "KCalories")
00262   {
00263     mEnergyType=KCalories;
00264   }
00265   else if (myEnergyType == "TDN")
00266   {
00267     mEnergyType=TDN;
00268   }
00269   
00270   mFodderUse=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fodderUse").text()).toInt();
00271   // populate the fodder map
00272   mFoodSourceMap.clear();
00273   QDomNodeList myFodderCropsList = myDocument.elementsByTagName("fodderCrop");
00274   for (int myCounter=0; myCounter < myFodderCropsList.size(); myCounter++)
00275   {
00276     QDomNode myFoodSourceNode = myFodderCropsList.item(myCounter);
00277     QDomElement myFoodSourceElement = myFoodSourceNode.toElement();
00278 
00279     // load the data from the xml into local variables
00280     QString myCropGuid = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderCropGuid").text();
00281     int myFodderStrawChaff = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderStrawChaff").text().toInt();
00282     int myGrain = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderGrain").text().toInt();
00283     int myDays = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderDays").text().toInt();
00284     int myUsedInt = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderUse").text().toInt();
00285     bool myUsed = (myUsedInt == 0) ? 0:1;
00286     LaFoodSource myFoodSource;
00287 
00288     // setup the data to insert into the map
00289     myFoodSource.setFodder(myFodderStrawChaff);
00290     myFoodSource.setGrain(myGrain);
00291     myFoodSource.setDays(myDays);
00292     myFoodSource.setUsed(myUsed);
00293     myFoodSource.setCropGuid(myCropGuid);
00294     // insert data into map
00295     mFoodSourceMap.insert(myCropGuid,myFoodSource);
00296     //mFodderSourceMap.insert(myCropGuid,myFoodSource);
00297   } // end of for loop
00298  //qDebug("Number of food sources restored from xml: " + QString::number(mFoodSourceMap.count()).toLocal8Bit());
00299   setFodderData(mFoodSourceMap);
00300   QString myFallowUsage = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fallowUsage").text());
00301   if (myFallowUsage == "High")
00302   {
00303     mFallowUsage=High;
00304   }
00305   else if (myFallowUsage == "Medium")
00306   {
00307     mFallowUsage=Medium;
00308   }
00309   else if (myFallowUsage == "Low")
00310   {
00311     mFallowUsage=Low;
00312   }
00313   else
00314   {
00315     mFallowUsage=None;
00316   }
00317   mRasterName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("rasterName").text());
00318   return true;
00319 }
00320 
00321 QString LaAnimalParameter::toXml()
00322 {
00323   QString myString;
00324 
00325   myString+=QString("<animalParameter guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00326   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00327   myString+=QString("  <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "</description>\n");
00328   myString+=QString("  <animal>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mAnimalGuid) + "</animal>\n");
00329   myString+=QString("  <percentTameMeat>" + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "</percentTameMeat>\n");
00330   myString+=QString("  <useCommonGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "</useCommonGrazingLand>\n");
00331   myString+=QString("  <useSpecificGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "</useSpecificGrazingLand>\n");  myString+=QString("  <foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "</foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand>\n");
00332   myString+=QString("  <foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "</foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand>\n");
00333 
00334   switch (mAreaUnits)
00335   {
00336     case Dunum:
00337       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Dunum</areaUnits>\n");
00338       break;
00339     case Hectare:
00340       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Hectare</areaUnits>\n");
00341       break;
00342   }
00343 
00344   switch (mEnergyType)
00345   {
00346     case KCalories:
00347       myString+=QString("  <energyType>KCalories</energyType>\n");
00348       break;
00349     case TDN:
00350       myString+=QString("  <energyType>TDN</energyType\n");
00351       break;
00352   }
00353 
00354   myString+=QString("  <fodderUse>"+ QString::number(mFodderUse) +"</fodderUse>\n");
00355 
00356   if (mFodderUse)
00357   {
00358 
00359    //qDebug("Fodder is used");
00360     myString+=QString("   <fodderCrops>\n");
00361     // write out the map for fodder info to xml
00362     QMapIterator<QString, LaFoodSource> myIterator(mFoodSourceMap);
00363     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00364     {
00365       myIterator.next();
00366       
00367       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myIterator.value();
00368       QString myGuid = myIterator.key();
00369       QString myFodderStrawChaff = QString::number(myFoodSource.fodder());
00370       QString myFodderGrain = QString::number(myFoodSource.grain());
00371       QString myFodderDays = QString::number(myFoodSource.days());
00372       
00373       myString+=QString("    <fodderCrop>\n");
00374       myString+=QString("      <fodderCropGuid>" + myGuid + "</fodderCropGuid>\n");
00375       myString+=QString("      <fodderStrawChaff>" + myFodderStrawChaff + "</fodderStrawChaff>\n");
00376       myString+=QString("      <fodderGrain>"+ myFodderGrain + "</fodderGrain>\n");
00377       myString+=QString("      <fodderDays>"+ myFodderDays + "</fodderDays>\n");
00378       myString+=QString("    </fodderCrop>\n");
00379     }
00380     myString+=QString("   </fodderCrops>\n");
00381   }
00382   else
00383   {
00384    //qDebug("Fodder is not used");
00385   }
00386 
00387   switch (mFallowUsage)
00388   {
00389     case  High:
00390       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>High</fallowUsage>\n");
00391       break;
00392     case  Medium:
00393       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>Medium</fallowUsage>\n");
00394       break;
00395     case  Low:
00396       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>Low</fallowUsage>\n");
00397       break;
00398     default:
00399       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage></fallowUsage>\n");
00400       break;
00401   } //switch
00402   myString+=QString("  <rasterName>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "</RasterName>\n");
00403   myString+=QString("</animalParameter>\n");
00404   return myString;
00405 }

00407 QString LaAnimalParameter::toText()
00408 {
00409   QString myString;
00410 
00411   myString+=QString("guid=>" + guid() + "\n");
00412   myString+=QString("name=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "\n");
00413   myString+=QString("description=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "\n");
00414   myString+=QString("animal=>" + mAnimalGuid + "\n");
00415   myString+=QString("percentTameMeat=>" + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "\n");
00416   myString+=QString("useCommonGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "\n");
00417   myString+=QString("useSpecificGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "\n");
00418   myString+=QString("foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "\n");
00419   myString+=QString("foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "\n");
00420   myString+=QString("areaUnits=>" + QString::number(mAreaUnits) + "\n");
00421   myString+=QString("energyType=>" + QString::number(mEnergyType) + "\n");
00422   myString+=QString("fodderUse=>" + QString::number(mFodderUse) + "\n");
00423 
00424   if (mFodderUse)
00425   {
00426 
00427    //qDebug("Fodder is used");
00428     myString+=QString("   <fodderCrops>\n");
00429     // write out the map for fodder info to xml
00430     QMapIterator<QString, LaFoodSource> myIterator(mFoodSourceMap);
00431     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00432     {
00433       myIterator.next();
00434       
00435       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myIterator.value();
00436       QString myGuid = myIterator.key();
00437       QString myFodderStrawChaff = QString::number(myFoodSource.fodder());
00438       QString myFodderGrain = QString::number(myFoodSource.grain());
00439       QString myFodderDays = QString::number(myFoodSource.days());
00440       
00441       myString+=QString("    <fodderCrop>\n");
00442       myString+=QString("      <fodderCropGuid>" + myGuid + "</fodderCropGuid>\n");
00443       myString+=QString("      <fodderStrawChaff>" + myFodderStrawChaff + "</fodderStrawChaff>\n");
00444       myString+=QString("      <fodderGrain>"+ myFodderGrain + "</fodderGrain>\n");
00445       myString+=QString("      <fodderDays>"+ myFodderDays + "</fodderDays>\n");
00446       myString+=QString("    </fodderCrop>\n");
00447     }
00448     myString+=QString("   </fodderCrops>\n");
00449   }
00450   else
00451   {
00452     myString+="Fodder not used";
00453   }
00454 
00455   myString+=QString("fallowUsage=>" + QString::number(mFallowUsage) + "\n");
00456   myString+=QString("rasterName=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "\n");
00457   return myString;
00458 }
00459 
00460 QString LaAnimalParameter::toHtml()
00461 {
00462   QString myString;
00463   QString myFallowUsage;
00464   switch (mFallowUsage)
00465   {
00466     case  High:
00467       myFallowUsage=QString("High Priority");
00468       break;
00469     case  Medium:
00470       myFallowUsage=QString("Medium Priority");
00471       break;
00472     case  Low:
00473       myFallowUsage=QString("Low Priority");
00474       break;
00475     default:
00476       myFallowUsage=QString("None");
00477       break;
00478   }
00479 
00480   myString+="<h3 >Details for " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
00481   myString+="<table>";
00482   //myString+="<tr><td>GUID:</th><td>" + guid() + "</td></tr>";
00483   myString+="<tr><td>Description:</td><td>" + mDescription + "</td></tr>";
00484   //myString+="<tr><td>Animal:</td><td>" + mAnimalGuid + "</td></tr>";
00485   myString+="<tr><td>Raster Mask:</td><td>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "</td></tr>";
00486   myString+="<tr><td>Percentage of Tame Meat:</td><td> " + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "</td></tr>";
00487   myString+="<tr><td>Use Common Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00488   myString+="<tr><td>Use Specific Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00489   myString+="<tr><td>Food Value Of Common Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00490   myString+="<tr><td>Food Value Of Specific Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00491   myString+="<tr><td>Energy Type:</td><td> "+ QString::number(mEnergyType) + "</td></tr>";
00492   myString+="<tr><td>Area Units:</td><td> "+ QString::number(mAreaUnits) + "</td></tr>";
00493 
00494 
00495   if (myFallowUsage=="None")
00496   {
00497     myString+="<tr><td>No Fallow Grazing</td></tr>";
00498   }
00499   else
00500   {
00501     myString+="<tr><td>Fallow Grazing:</td><td>" + myFallowUsage + "</td></tr>";
00502   }
00503   if (mFodderUse)
00504   {
00505     myString+=QString("   <fodderCrops>\n");
00506     // write out the map for fodder info to xml
00507     int myCounter = 0;
00508     QMapIterator<QString, LaFoodSource> myIterator(mFoodSourceMap);
00509     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00510     {
00511       myIterator.next();
00512       myCounter++;
00513       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myIterator.value();
00514 
00515       QString myGuid = myIterator.key();
00516       QString myFodderStrawChaff = QString::number(myFoodSource.fodder());
00517       QString myFodderGrain = QString::number(myFoodSource.grain());
00518       QString myFodderDays = QString::number(myFoodSource.days());
00519 
00520       myString+="<tr><td>Fodder Source #:</td><td> " + QString::number(myCounter) + "</td></tr>";
00521       myString+="<tr><td>Crop Guid: "+ myGuid + "</td></tr>";
00522       myString+="<tr><td>Straw and Chaff: "+ myFodderStrawChaff + "</td></tr>";
00523       myString+="<tr><td>Grain: "+ myFodderGrain + "</td></tr>";
00524       myString+="<tr><td>Days: "+ myFodderDays + "</td></tr>";
00525     }
00526   }
00527   else
00528   {
00529     myString+="<tr><td>Fodder not used</td><td>";
00530   }
00531 
00532   myString+="</table>";
00533   return myString;
00534 }
